commandKey - Variable in class game.Game
Key which stores the most recent keyboard key to be compared with the debug mode's key.
conductQueuedMovement(Game) - Method in class game.Waka
A method for queued movement, allowing Waka to turn in the direction of a keypress only if Waka is in the centre of the current cell and there is no wall blocking the path.
conductReverseDirection(Game) - Method in class game.Waka
Allows Waka to instantly turn in the opposite direction if the opposite keyboard keypress is made.
conductReverseMovement(Game) - Method in class game.Ghost
Allow ghosts to rebound in the direction they came from if and only if they reach a dead-end.
Consumable - Class in game
Superclass for consumable objects from which fruit, superfruit and sodacan extend from.

Initialises variables of the consumable object.
consumableList - Variable in class game.Game
A list storing all the consumable objects in the game.

game - package game
 
game - Variable in class game.App
The Game object.
Game - Class in game
General game manager class which stores all the states and attributes about the game session and directs all functions of the game.
Game(App, String) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructor that parses and initialises all game data.
Game(String) - Constructor for class game.Game
An overloaded constructor for testing purposes so game attributes can be individually instantiated.
GameObject - Class in game
General purpose object superclass of all objects in the game.
GameObject(int, int, PImage) - Constructor for class game.GameObject
General superclass constructor which is called by all game objects to instantiate its most basic attributes.
getCx(int) - Method in class game.GameObject
Finds the x coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current x position to the nearest multiple of 16.
getCy(int) - Method in class game.GameObject
Finds the y coordinate of the closest 16x16 cell by rounding down the current y position to the nearest multiple of 16.
getTarget(Game) - Method in class game.Ghost
Retrieves a list containing the x and y distances to the target and manipulate it to fit certain conditions.
Ghost - Class in game
Ghost superclass which manages all aspects of ghost functionality.
